select job.job_id, job.job_name,job.job_detail,job.exp_condition,job.edu_condition,job.salary,recruiter.re_company_id, job.tag,job.recruiter_id,recruiter.re_realname,recruiter.re_company_position,job.work_city,job.work_address,job.post_date,job.job_classes_id, company.company_name,company.company_head_img,company.industry,company.finan_condition,company.size_condition,company.company_tags from job left join recruiter on job.recruiter_id = recruiter.re_id left join company on recruiter.re_company_id = company.company_id where 1 = 1
and job.job_name LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
and job.job_classes_id = #{jobClassesId}
and job.exp_condition = #{expCondition}
and job.edu_condition = #{eduCondition}
and job.salary < 3000
and job.salary >= 3000 and job.salary < 5000
and job.salary >= 5000 and job.salary < 10000
and job.salary >= 10000 and job.salary < 15000
and job.salary >= 15000 and job.salary < 20000
and job.salary >= 20000 and job.salary < 30000
and job.salary >= 30000 and job.salary < 50000
and job.salary >= 50000
and job.post_date = curdate()
and job.post_date > DATE_SUB(curdate, INTERVAL 3 DAY) and job.post_date <= curdate()
and job.post_date > DATE_SUB(curdate, INTERVAL 7 DAY) and job.post_date <= curdate()
and job.post_date > DATE_SUB(curdate, INTERVAL 15 DAY) and job.post_date <= curdate()
and job.post_date >= DATE_SUB(curdate, INTERVAL 1 MONTH ) and job.post_date <= curdate()
and job.job_id = #{jobId}
order by post_date DESC
limit #{start},2
